## Checklist (Optional - all items are recommendations, not blockers)

- [ ] PR title follows conventions ([see conventions](.github/pull_request_title_conventions.md))
- [ ] Documentation updated or follow-up issue created
- [ ] Tests added/updated (recommended for bug fixes and new features)
- [ ] Domain boundaries respected (if applicable for DDD architecture)
- [ ] Breaking changes documented (if any)
